title: Mischa Barton goes shopping at Petco in black baby-doll dress with billowy sleeves
text:
They were last spotted out getting coffee together at Starbucks on Monday.

And on Tuesday Mischa Barton and reconciled ex-boyfriend James Abercrombie were spotted out-and-about again at a West Hollywood Petco on Tuesday.

The 33–year–old Hills: New Beginnings star wore a roomy black dress with a baby-doll silhouette and billowy sleeves for the outing.

Out: The 33–year–old Hills: New Beginnings star wore a roomy black dress with a baby-doll silhouette and billowy sleeves for the outing

She shaded her vision with black wayfarer sunglasses and wore a couple of gold chains around her neck.

The 5ft9in OC star's feet hit the pavement in a pair of backless penny loafers with a gold accent.

Her golden blonde tresses were pulled back into a simple ponytail.

Busy: The 5ft9in OC star's feet hit the pavement in a pair of backless penny loafers with a gold accent

Reunited? Mischa Barton, 33, was spotted back together in LA on Monday with her ex-boyfriend James Abercrombie, whom she broke up with in July

Mischa and James first went their separate ways in July, not long after fans noticed that the actress–turned–reality star had unfollowed the heir on social media.

At the time, a source told RadarOnline that 'James just turned out to not be the person she thought he was,' and that Mischa was 'taking some time to focus on herself right now.'

Another source told E! that Mischa 'broke up with him is to focus on her career.'

They actress may have wanted to make a serious go at protecting her new role on MTV's rebooted Hills.

'This is the first time Mischa is actually having a second life in her career, and she wants to focus on it,' they added.

Splitsville: Mischa and James began dating in spring 2017, but Mischa ended things in July 2019, reportedly to focus on her role on The Hills: New Beginnings; pictured in 2017

Mischa began dating James, a model from Melbourne, Australia, in spring 2017, shortly after the two met at a party in LA.

James is the heir to a $574 million family fortune through his father Andrew Abercrombie, chairman of the FlexiGroup and former treasurer of Australia's Liberal Party.

The model's Instagram often featured glimpses into his luxurious lifestyle with photos of his private jet travel and yacht trips, but he and Mischa kept their relationship relatively low key, rarely posting pictures of each other to social media.

Their relationship followed a period of turmoil for the actress, who was hospitalized in January after a neighbor spotted her ranting over her backyard fence.

She later claimed that medical staff told her she had been given the date rape drug GHB.

Stressed: For over a year, a lawsuit against a former flame dominated her life and Mischa once credited James with 'helping her through', telling The New York Times: 'I think the thing that drove us together'; shown in 2009

Mischa also took a stand in March 2017, when she and her lawyer Lisa Bloom announced that an ex-boyfriend had filmed a revenge porn video and was attempting to shop the tape around to interested buyers.

She obtained a restraining order against the former beau in May of that year.

In an interview with the New York Times, Mischa credited her then-boyfriend James with 'helping her through' the upheaval, adding, 'I think it drove us together.'

So far, neither Mischa nor James have commented on the status of their relationship.
